aqi_descriptions.good: Air quality is ideal for everyone.
aqi_descriptions.fair: Air quality is acceptable for most people.
aqi_descriptions.moderate: Sensitive groups should limit prolonged outdoor exertion.
aqi_descriptions.poor: Everyone may begin to experience health effects; sensitive groups should avoid outdoor activities.
aqi_descriptions.very_poor: Health warnings of emergency conditions. Everyone should avoid outdoor exertion.

advice.good: No precautions needed. Enjoy your day!
advice.fair: Sensitive groups should stay alert but can enjoy outdoor activities.
advice.moderate: Reduce prolonged outdoor exertion if you're sensitive.
advice.poor: Consider staying indoors, especially for sensitive groups.
advice.very_poor: Avoid going outside. Use air purifiers if possible.
advice.unknown: No advice available for this air quality level.

advice.high_pm2_5: Avoid outdoor activities as fine particulate matter is high.
advice.high_o3: Limit outdoor exertion, particularly during sunny hours due to ozone.

children.moderate: Limit outdoor activities during peak pollution hours.
children.high: Keep children indoors with an air purifier running.

adults.moderate: Consider wearing a mask if you're pollution-sensitive.
adults.high: Avoid outdoor activities and limit physical exertion.

elderly.low: Take a morning walk in fresh air.
elderly.high: Stay indoors and ensure good air quality at home.

health.enter_age: Enter your age for more detailed recommendations.
health.age_specific: Recommendations for age {{age}}: Consider staying indoors during high AQI levels and minimize outdoor activities.
